_description: Comprehensive PDF layout configuration with multi-column support, advanced positioning, and ATS optimization

layout.comments: Options: single_column, two_column, hybrid (flexible per section)

page_settings.comments: Adjust margins only if space optimization needed. Current values maintain professional appearance.

header.comments: Header style: professional, compact, bold. Tagline position: inline (next to name), below, hidden. Contact layout: horizontal, vertical, grid

professional_summary.comments: Style options: paragraph (block text), hybrid (opening + bullets), two_column, bullets_only. Visual: none, accent_border, background_tint, pullquote

technical_expertise.comments: Columns: 1-3 for skills grid. Card style: bordered, minimal, elevated

experience.comments: Header style: company_first, title_first, balanced. Date format: mmm_yyyy, mm_yyyy, full

projects.comments: Structure: bullets (legacy), challenge_approach_impact (CAI), structured_bullets. Card layout: true for grid, false for list

education.comments: Can be paired with publications in section_rows

rows.comments: Education and publications side by side

section_rows.comments: Group sections horizontally. Widths must sum to 100%. Alignment: top, center, bottom

multi_column_sections.comments: EXPERIMENTAL: Skills sidebar with experience in main column. May affect ATS parsing. Layout: sidebar_main, two_column_equal

typography.comments: Inter font optimized for professional documents. Adjust base_size cautiously to maintain readability

spacing.comments: Reduced from previous version for better space utilization without crowding

colors.title: #b45309
colors.comments: Professional color palette. Accent used sparingly for emphasis.

highlighting.comments: Strategic highlighting for human reviewers. Metrics: numbers/percentages. Technologies: from technology lists. Keep minimal to avoid overwhelming.

ats_optimization.comments: ATS-friendly settings. Keep critical content in single column for reliable parsing.

advanced.comments: Debug mode shows section boundaries. Page break strategy: smart (avoid orphans), manual (config only), auto (browser default)

_usage_notes.description: Place this file as 'resume_layout_config.json' in job folder
_usage_notes.priority: Settings here override defaults in generate-pdf-enhanced.js
_usage_notes.validation: Invalid options will fall back to defaults with console warnings
recommended_workflow: 1. Run multi-agent pipeline to generate resume_final.json
2. Customize this config for specific job requirements

layout_tips.space_optimization: Reduce section_margin and item_margin before touching font sizes or line height
layout_tips.readability: Maintain line_height >= 1.4 and base_size >= 9pt for professional appearance
layout_tips.highlighting: Less is more - max 3-4 highlights per bullet keeps focus sharp
layout_tips.columns: Use section_rows for Education+Publications pairing. Avoid multi_column_sections unless ATS not a concern
